item.title: Hurricane ISABEL Forecast/Advisory Number 14
item.description:
Issued at 1500Z TUE SEP 09 2003 
ZCZC MIATCMAT3 ALL
TTAA00 KNHC DDHHMM
HURRICANE ISABEL FORECAST/ADVISORY NUMBER  14
NWS TPC/NATIONAL HURRICANE CENTER MIAMI FL   AL132003
1500Z TUE SEP 09 2003
 
HURRICANE CENTER LOCATED NEAR 19.6N  46.9W AT 09/1500Z
POSITION ACCURATE WITHIN  15 NM
 
PRESENT MOVEMENT TOWARD THE WEST-NORTHWEST OR 300 DEGREES AT  12 KT
 
ESTIMATED MINIMUM CENTRAL PRESSURE  948 MB
EYE DIAMETER  25 NM
MAX SUSTAINED WINDS 115 KT WITH GUSTS TO 140 KT.
64 KT....... 40NE  30SE  30SW  40NW.
50 KT.......100NE  50SE  50SW 100NW.
34 KT.......150NE 100SE  75SW 150NW.
12 FT SEAS..225NE 175SE 175SW 225NW.
WINDS AND SEAS VARY GREATLY IN EACH QUADRANT.  RADII IN NAUTICAL
MILES ARE THE LARGEST RADII EXPECTED ANYWHERE IN THAT QUADRANT.
 
REPEAT...CENTER LOCATED NEAR 19.6N  46.9W AT 09/1500Z
AT 09/1200Z CENTER WAS LOCATED NEAR 19.4N  46.3W
 
FORECAST VALID 10/0000Z 20.1N  48.4W
MAX WIND 120 KT...GUSTS 145 KT.
64 KT... 40NE  30SE  30SW  40NW.
50 KT...100NE  50SE  50SW 100NW.
34 KT...150NE 100SE  75SW 150NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 10/1200Z 20.3N  50.3W
MAX WIND 125 KT...GUSTS 155 KT.
64 KT... 50NE  40SE  40SW  50NW.
50 KT...100NE  60SE  60SW 100NW.
34 KT...150NE 100SE 100SW 150NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 11/0000Z 20.2N  52.3W
MAX WIND 120 KT...GUSTS 145 KT.
64 KT... 50NE  40SE  40SW  50NW.
50 KT...100NE  60SE  60SW 100NW.
34 KT...160NE 120SE 120SW 160NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 11/1200Z 19.9N  54.0W
MAX WIND 115 KT...GUSTS 140 KT.
50 KT...100NE  60SE  60SW 100NW.
34 KT...160NE 120SE 120SW 160NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 12/1200Z 20.0N  57.0W
MAX WIND 115 KT...GUSTS 140 KT.
50 KT...100NE  60SE  60SW 100NW.
34 KT...160NE 120SE 120SW 160NW.
 
EXTENDED OUTLOOK. NOTE...ERRORS FOR TRACK HAVE AVERAGED NEAR 275 NM
ON DAY 4 AND 375 NM ON DAY 5...AND FOR INTENSITY NEAR 20 KT EACH DAY
 
OUTLOOK VALID 13/1200Z 20.5N  60.5W
MAX WIND 110 KT...GUSTS 135 KT.
 
OUTLOOK VALID 14/1200Z 21.0N  64.5W
MAX WIND 110 KT...GUSTS 135 KT.
 
REQUEST FOR 3 HOURLY SHIP REPORTS WITHIN 300 MILES OF 19.6N  46.9W
 
NEXT ADVISORY AT 09/2100Z
 
FORECASTER STEWART
item.author: jason.fleming@seahorsecoastal.com
